mddocs.description: The 'mddocs' property encapsulates all settings for MdDocs

assemblyPath.title: Command Line Help: Assembly Path
assemblyPath.description: The path to the assembly to generate documentation from.

outputPath.title: Command Line Help: Output Path
outputPath.description: The directory path to save the generated documentation to.

includeVersion.title: Command Line Help: Include Version
includeVersion.description: Controls whether the version of the application is included in the generated documentation.

includeAutoGeneratedNotice.title: Command Line Help: Include AutoGenerated Notice
includeAutoGeneratedNotice.description: Controls whether the generated documentation includes a comment that indicates the files were auto-generated.
